key_points.description: Professionals with global track records adapting to UK recruitment systems.

items.title: Skilled migrants navigating sponsorship
items.description: You are balancing visa timelines, dependants and the pace of UK recruitment.

items.title: International graduates staying to work
items.description: You need to translate internships, placements or overseas experience into language UK employers trust.

items.title: Partners relocating with families

process.title: Process & milestones
process.description: We usually partner for eight to ten sessions across three months with optional co-working sprints.

steps.title: Map the hiring landscape
steps.description: We unpack sector norms, sponsorship realities and what evidence UK employers seek.

steps.title: Build your narrative toolkit
steps.description: We co-write scripts, portfolio stories and Q&A to use with recruiters, hiring managers and networks.

steps.title: Sustain the search
steps.description: We monitor energy, iterate weekly plans and celebrate momentum so you do not burn out.

process.note: You can add document reviews or mock interviews between sessions when deadlines appear.

boundaries.title: Boundaries & consent
boundaries.description: Support stays client-led and trauma-aware while we navigate systemic barriers together.

items.question: Will you suggest exploitative routes?
items.answer: Never. We refuse unpaid trials or unsafe arrangements and help you push back on extraction.

items.question: Do you promise fast sponsorship?
items.answer: We focus on evidence-based strategy and transparent timelines, not algorithm hacks or false guarantees.

items.question: How do you respond to bias?
items.answer: If discrimination appears, we plan protective responses, document incidents, and signpost legal allies.

items.question: Do you review CVs and LinkedIn profiles?
items.answer: Yes. We co-create versions that respect your voice while aligning with UK conventions.

items.question: Will you introduce me directly to employers?
items.answer: We do not broker jobs, but we help you design outreach and accountability for relationship building.

items.question: Can we switch languages during sessions?
items.answer: We can coach in English and Mandarin and draft materials in whichever language serves you best.

cta.title: Want a grounded partner for your UK job search?
cta.description: Let us hear your story and constraints so we can shape a coaching plan that respects them.
